attributes.action: I call for halting of chemical weather experiments designed to "dim the sun"
attributes.additional_details: I believe no large-scale geoengineering should proceed without explicit democratic consent. Dimming the sun through chemical spraying affects every community, ecosystem, and generation. Yet the public has not been informed, consulted, or given any say. Government has a duty to represent its citizens’ interests and guard against unilateral decisions by scientists or private entities.
attributes.background: I urge the Government and Parliament to enact legislation prohibiting all chemical solar dimming experiments. They must impose an immediate moratorium on proposed geoengineering trials, ensuring no chemicals are released until comprehensive, independent environmental+health assessments are completed

rejection.details:
